728384f-b.text:
Arthur Kill Road, adjoining the N.W. corner of Abingdon Svenue, showing the ruins of the Benham Mansion. It was the residence of Admiral Andrew Ellicott Kennedy Benham which was destroyed by fire in 1897.
May 1, 1925
Views 1, 2
P.L. Soerr

(1)
600 Arthur Kill Road, south side, between Abingdon and Brookfield Aves., showing the Metcalfe homestead.

728363f-b.text:
651 Arthur Eill Road, west of the N.W. corner of Abingdon Avenue, showing the Benham-Seaman home. P. L. Sperr states that part of the house is about 200
Mears old. The view is northward.
May 1, 1926
P. L. Sperr
(s)
A view of the rear of the house.
April 28, 1925
P. L. Sperr
(3)
Viewing the house from the north.
My 30, 1927
P. L. Sperr
